segments.text: This whole scene feels like a setup for multiple accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuously running water from the sink is going to make the floor incredibly slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone, probably the woman, is surely going to slip in that expanding puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe her foot is literally in it and she's not reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, teetering on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted precariously; a slight shift could send him tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a wet floor could be quite serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the broken dishes, the potential for cuts and bruises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the wooden cabinets will be extensive, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these risks are happening simultaneously, completely unnoticed by the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine cascade of impending hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout a warning to prevent what seems inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dangers are so clear to an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a minefield of potential mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR
